text: Ich habe Herrn Schwarenthorer an der WU als hervorragenden Koordinator kennengelernt. Die Zusammenarbeit war immer perfekt.
author: Univ.-Prof. Dr. Sebastian Kummer, Head of the Institute of Transport and Logistics bei Vienna University of Economics and Business

text: Patient, decent and helpful! Big help for all players who are representing Austria on the Beach Volleyball Worldtour and European Tour!
author: Daniel Huper, Professional Beachvolleyball Player & Marketing Expert

text: Pirmin was instrumental to the implementation of various processes during his internship. Excellent knowledge of supply chain improvement and customer satisfaction. Humble and eager to take on any challenge and made a huge success of the tasks given
author: Murdo van Aardt, Warehouse Operations Manager at Doka South Africa

text: I highly recommend this guy. Glad to have him back in 2016 when he is going to work out his Master Thesis in the field of ODL.
author: Viktor Sonnleitner, Project- & Process Manager at Doka
